author: @rankandstyle
title: Get A Better Butt Instantly With These 10 Pairs Of Reviewer-Loved Jeans
text:
Putting on an amazing
pair of jeans that flatters your figure in all the right places can provide an instant confidence boost. But finding said amazing pair of jeans is typically not a one-and-done sort of deal. If you've ever searched for your dream denim, you've likely had a list of criteria handy for the lengthy shopping trip: the right length, a flattering rise, a chic leg opening, a certain washâ€”you know the drill. And when you finally find a style that checks all of the boxes above, you're ready to declare a winner.
But nothing compares to the feeling of finding a style that ticks all those boxes while giving you a
booty boost worthy of a peach emoji. There's a science behind the styles that master it, and from the hours we've spent in the dressing room, we've learned that it has a lot to do with pocket placement, coverage, and yoke (the Y-shaped patch between the waistband and back pockets). So in the interest of sculpting our assets without having to do a single squat, we embarked on a mission to find the jeans with the best combination of derriere-sculpting details. Ahead, we've rounded up the Top 10 pairs that made the cut.
Our Method For Finding The Best Butt-Shaping Jeans
To round up this list, we turned to the help of our data-driven algorithm. This unbiased tool factors in best-selling buzz, editor recommendations, rave reviews, and more to find and rank the best products on the web. From skinny to straight, scroll on to shop the 10 best pairs of butt-shaping jeans. Prefer to watch the results rather than read them?
View our TikTok, where we walk you through the best butt-shaping jeans on the internet. [Jump To Products](#gap-high-rise-cheeky-straight-jeans)
September 7, 2023
Written By:
[Rank & Style](/bio/rank-and-style)
Product Expert:
[Georgia Jones](/bio/georgia-jones)
Top 10 Lists serve as unbiased shopping guides to the most trusted product recommendations on the internet. Products are scored and ranked using an
[algorithm](/how-we-rank-products) backed by data consumers find most valuable when making a purchase. We are reader-supported and may earn a [commission](/about) when you shop through our links.

title: Yeferson Cossio se fue por todo lo alto como PapÃ¡ Noel: cumpliÃ³ con el 'regalo prometido' para 50 niÃ±os - Infobae
text:
Cada niÃ±o recibiÃ³ una canasta familiar, un detalle que buscÃ³ beneficiar no solo a los menores, sino tambiÃ©n a sus familias - crÃ©dito yefersoncossio/Instagram El creador de contenido colombiano Yeferson Cossio llevÃ³ a cabo un gesto solidario durante la temporada navideÃ±a que no pasÃ³ desapercibido.
El influenciador decidiÃ³ disfrazarse de PapÃ¡ Noel y visitar una fundaciÃ³n infantil donde sorprendiÃ³ a 50 niÃ±os con regalos, ropa, zapatos y canastas familiares.
Ahora puede seguirnos en Facebook y en nuestro WhatsApp Channel .
En un video publicado en su cuenta de Instagram, el creador de contenido explicÃ³ que no solo adquiriÃ³ los juguetes que los niÃ±os habÃ­an pedido, sino que tambiÃ©n quiso ir mÃ¡s allÃ¡ al proporcionarles ropa nueva y un par de zapatos a cada uno. Cada niÃ±o recibiÃ³ una canasta familiar, un detalle que buscÃ³ beneficiar no solo a los menores, sino tambiÃ©n a sus familias. Este acto de generosidad fue ampliamente elogiado en redes sociales, donde muchos de los internautas destacaron el impacto positivo de sus acciones.
El influencer no escatimÃ³ en gastos para garantizar que los niÃ±os de la fundaciÃ³n tuvieran una Navidad inolvidable - crÃ©dito yefersoncossio/Instagram â€œSimplemente un ser humano maravillosoâ€, â€œPleno bro. Dios te bendiga ğŸ™â€, â€œEso son bendiciones para usted ğŸ™â€, â€œLa sonrisa de un niÃ±o lo es todoâ€, Dios te bendiga parcerito por ese corazÃ³n tan grande que tienes", â€œHiciste felices a esos 50 niÃ±os y la vida te devolverÃ¡ el dobleâ€, â€œEl video que estaba esperandoâ€, â€œGracias por hacer bien a este mundoâ€, â€œQue grande eres Yefitoâ€; fueron algunos de los comentarios de los usuarios y seguidores del creador de contenido.
Esta no es la primera vez que Yeferson Cossio utiliza su posiciÃ³n y recursos para ayudar a los mÃ¡s necesitados. A lo largo de su carrera, el influenciador ha demostrado un interÃ©s constante en apoyar a personas en situaciÃ³n de vulnerabilidad, asÃ­ como a refugios de animales y diversas fundaciones sin fines lucrativos. Este compromiso social ha sido una constante en su vida, a pesar de que tambiÃ©n es conocido por su estilo de vida lujoso, que incluye viajes internacionales, vehÃ­culos de alta gama y todo tipo de excentricidades.
El influencer decidiÃ³ disfrazarse de PapÃ¡ Noel y visitar una fundaciÃ³n infantil, donde sorprendiÃ³ a 50 niÃ±os con regalos, ropa, zapatos y canastas familiares - crÃ©dito yefersoncossio/Instagram En esta ocasiÃ³n, el influenciador no escatimÃ³ en gastos para garantizar que los niÃ±os de la fundaciÃ³n tuvieran una Navidad inolvidable. En el video compartido en sus redes sociales, Cossio mostrÃ³ algunos de los obsequios que habÃ­a adquirido y expresÃ³ su satisfacciÃ³n por poder contribuir a la felicidad de los pequeÃ±os. â€œLe comprÃ© a todos los niÃ±os todos los regalos que habÃ­an pedidoâ€ , afirmÃ³, mientras detallaba los esfuerzos realizados para cumplir con cada una de las solicitudes.
En un contexto donde las figuras pÃºblicas suelen ser objeto de crÃ­ticas por su estilo de vida ostentoso, el caso de Yeferson Cossio resalta como un ejemplo de cÃ³mo el Ã©xito puede ser utilizado para beneficiar a otros. Su decisiÃ³n de convertirse en â€œSanta Clausâ€ para los niÃ±os de la fundaciÃ³n no solo alegrÃ³ a los pequeÃ±os, sino que tambiÃ©n enviÃ³ un mensaje de solidaridad y esperanza en una Ã©poca del aÃ±o marcada por el espÃ­ritu de compartir.
La Navidad de 2024 serÃ¡ recordada por estos 50 niÃ±os como un momento especial, gracias a la intervenciÃ³n de Yeferson Cossio, quien demostrÃ³ que el verdadero espÃ­ritu navideÃ±o radica en dar y compartir con los demÃ¡s.
Yeferson Cossio publicÃ³ un video en Instagram que provocÃ³ mÃºltiples crÃ­ticas por su contenido relacionado con drogas - crÃ©dito @yefersoncossio/Instagram Por otro lado, hay que recordar que recientemente Yeferson Cossio generÃ³ controversia tras publicar un video en redes sociales, que hasta el dÃ­a de hoy ha sido criticado por su contenido, relacionado con las drogas .
En el clip, se observa a su hermana Cintia y al streamer JH de la Cruz en una escena donde Cintia frota una cuchara en la piel de JH, lo que resulta con la apariciÃ³n de cacao en polvo. Posteriormente, Cossio intenta replicar la acciÃ³n con su novia, produciendo un polvo blancuzco que el streamer trata como si fuera una droga, dividiÃ©ndolo con una tarjeta de plÃ¡stico mientras se rÃ­e.

author: puebloalzao@aporrea.org (Luis SÃ¡nchez Ibarra)
title: TensiÃ³n mundial y por acÃ¡ terrorismo habitual - Por: Luis SÃ¡nchez Ibarra
text:
Pobreza intelectual muestran quienes no piensan con entereza lo que atraviesa el mundo y si por casualidad tocamos el tema afirman aparentemente seguros de sÃ­ mismos "esa vaina ocurre lejos de nosotros", si profundizas con ese tipo de personas te darÃ¡s cuenta 100 %, son de esos crÃ­ticos a la Venezuela actual, respaldando terrorismo de antemano a elecciones, aduciendo "Ã©ramos felices y no lo sabÃ­amos", o simplemente te espetan muy orondos "eso no ocurrÃ­a antes de esta vaina". Los he catalogado los simplistas, quienes le creyeron a las dictaduras desde siglos atrÃ¡s hasta la de PÃ©rez JimÃ©nez culminada en enero 1958, aquello de "no me meto en polÃ­tica y punto", o los engaÃ±aron cual pendejos entre 1959 a 1999 bajo quinquenios de la "democracia representativa", homicida y prosternada a los gringos en manera estÃºpida, volando de su pensamiento la soberanÃ­a e independencia republicana.
Escribo a escasos once dÃ­as de cumplirse el primer aÃ±o del conflicto en Ucrania, iniciado el siete de octubre 2023 por la influencia de un nazi fascista neo Adolfo Hitler desde Israel, el orate BenjamÃ­n Netanyahu apoyando a otro nazi fascista mussoliniano ucraniano el tal Zelensky. Desinformados ciudadanos creen a pie juntillas en la necesidad de esos criminales bombardeos sionistas hebreos a Gaza y Cisjordania, o los de la intervenciÃ³n del troglodita israelÃ­ sionista en LÃ­bano, queriendo desaparecer a sus habitantes vecinos de siempre. Dedico esta Ã¡cida pero constructiva a quienes les debe preocupar lo sucedido y por suceder asÃ­ sea muy lejos de Venezuela, ese tipo de gente ingresa a la porciÃ³n ignorantona por lo general contrarrevolucionaria mÃ¡s perdidos que, niÃ±o en procesiÃ³n al soltarse de las manos de sus padres.
Los opositores recalcitrantes y generalmente pesimamente informados, esos los imperdibles si se trata de colaborar, cooperar, incluso perder dinero dejÃ¡ndose estafar, por unos individuos del liderazgo contrarrevolucionario, quienes inventan fÃ³rmulas de chantaje y reciben dinero escuÃ¡lido para ilÃ­citos, el Ministerio PÃºblico les abriÃ³ investigaciÃ³n, la campaÃ±a chantajista "Ya casi Venezuela" respaldada por el mercenario Erik Prince recaudando dinero para acciones homicidas conspirativas contra Venezuela y su Presidente.
InformÃ³ el Fiscal General Tareck William Saab "hay una pantomima y la estamos tomando en serio, grupo de mercenarios estadounidenses con apoyo de sujetos cobardes prÃ³fugos de la justicia, residenciados en el exterior cometiendo delitos a escala mundial, el Fiscal dijo textual "con esta acciÃ³n los colaboradores son cÃ³mplices donando dÃ³lares en legitimaciÃ³n de capitales, ya identificados varios integrantes.
Da grima como de costumbre oÃ­r a espaÃ±olas y espaÃ±oles politiqueros, hablar pestes de Venezuela y decir abiertamente ser nuestra madre patria, olvidan los expulsamos como imperio que nos trajo su cultura apestosa contagiando a nuestros aborÃ­genes de enfermedades sexuales, amÃ©n de ser asesinos y ladrones de nuestras riquezas naturales. Hoy nos vengamos con nuestra verdad revolucionaria siglo XXI, no solo en Madrid, sino en la propia ONU en Nueva York y en el campeonato mundial de futbol sala, venciÃ©ndolos 2 goles a uno en el escenario de UzbekistÃ¡n donde se desarrolla el evento.
La Venezuela potencia recrea a sus habitantes, inaugurando diariamente obras de beneficio colectivo en salud, educaciÃ³n, cultura, atenciÃ³n a las necesidades para mejorar la distribuciÃ³n de agua, seguridad policial y preparaciÃ³n militar a la defensa de nuestro libÃ©rrimo territorio republicano soberano. CÃ³mplices de la desgracia mundial son los cobardes ante la alianza mortal estadounidense israelÃ­, en la ONU sus jefes el atolondrado Joe Biden y el cascarrabias nazi fascista Zelensky junto al orate Netanyahu, van a defender el arrase a la Palestina de Jesucristo.
Al asesinato de niÃ±os en los bombardeos indiscriminados, ellos mismos afirman no han podido imponer nada, pero huyendo hacia adelante bombas mediante en el holocausto siglo XXI, peor que el de la 2da. guerra mundial; padres, abuelos, bisabuelos, piensen en la masacre de niÃ±os, arruga nuestro corazÃ³n aunque digan algunos en forma imbÃ©cil que, esa guerra es muy lejos.

author: The Canadian Press
title: VIDEO: Commit to kindness, asks Canadaâ€™s Governor General - Kelowna Capital News
text: Gov. Gen. Mary Simon is calling on Canadians to commit themselves to kindness in her annual year-end message. The Governor General says the year 2023 presented challenges brought on by climate change and global conflict. But she says Canada also took â€œimportant strides in reconciliationâ€ and marked new chapters in history. Simon alternates between speaking English, her native Inuktitut and French â€” which she is still learning â€” in her address. She says people are adapting to change in different ways, including with kindness. And she says that over the past year, she honoured people who turned challenges into opportunities. Their stories should serve as an example of the â€œInuktitut word ajuinnata,â€ she says, which means â€œnever giving up.â€ Itâ€™s the same word Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy ended his address to Parliament with back in September, saying Simon shared it with him when they met. Simon ends her new yearâ€™s address by calling on Canadians to commit â€œto action, and to kindness, no matter how daunting the situation may be,â€ and to face the challenges over the year ahead â€œwith a renewed sense of unity.â€

author: PA News Agency
title: Full list of police-recorded antisemitic and Islamophobic offences, by force | Lancashire Telegraph
text:
Here is a list of the number of antisemitic and Islamophobic hate crime offences recorded by police forces from October 7 to November 7 2023 inclusive, together with totals for the equivalent periods in 2022 and 2021.
The figures have been obtained by the PA news agency from Freedom of Information requests sent to all forces in the UK.
The data is a snapshot of what has currently been recorded by forces and may be subject to change.
All figures are for crimes recorded by police forces, not incidents.
Systems and methods of recording and collating hate crime are not consistent across all forces, so the data cannot be used to compare the volume of offences between different areas or provide an overall total for the whole of the UK.
Some forces provided notes and responses to the data and these are included where appropriate.
Not all forces are included in the list and reasons for omissions are given at the end.
â€“ Avon & Somerset
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 5, 2022 â€“ 3, 2023 â€“ 7
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 8, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 5
The force said that completion of the â€œhate typeâ€ field on its records is not mandatory. Where a crime has taken place it will be recorded, but the hate crime indicator or type will not always be ticked, meaning some offences will have been recorded without an indication of the type of hate crime that has been committed.
â€“ Bedfordshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 2
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 8, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 3
â€“ British Transport Police
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 11, 2022 â€“ 8, 2023 â€“ 87
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 8, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 22
â€“ Cambridgeshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 6
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 5
The force said the figures are the number of police-recorded religious hate crimes where the perceived religion was Jewish or Muslim, based on the keyword assigned to the crime.
â€“ Dorset
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 4
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 1
â€“ Durham
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 0
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 1
The force said the figures refer to the number of recorded hate crimes where the victimâ€™s religion has been known to be Judaism or Islam.
â€“ Gloucestershire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 2
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 3
The force said the figures are for crimes where a hate tag has been applied, which have then been filtered to identify the hate strands â€œReligion â€“ Jewishâ€ and â€œReligion â€“ Muslimâ€.
â€“ Greater Manchester
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 14, 2022 â€“ 15, 2023 â€“ 74
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 42, 2022 â€“ 43, 2023 â€“ 34
The force said antisemitic offences are where the perceived targeted religion was recorded as Jewish. Islamophobic offences are where the perceived targeted religion was recorded as Muslim. More than one perceived religion can be recorded for an offence. Four crimes within the data had both Jewish and Muslim recorded as the perceived targeted religion.
â€“ Gwent
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 5
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 3
The force said that to obtain the data a filter was applied to identify racial and religious strands and a manual trawl was conducted on the crime summaries.
â€“ Hampshire & Isle of Wight
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 5, 2023 â€“ 6
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 5, 2022 â€“ 3, 2023 â€“ 4
â€“ Hertfordshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 6, 2023 â€“ 17
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 3
The force said the figures are for crimes that have a â€œReligion â€“ Jewishâ€ or â€œReligion â€“ Muslimâ€ (or both) flag attributed to the investigation record.
â€“ Humberside
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 7
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 2
â€“ Kent
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 7
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 9, 2022 â€“ 6, 2023 â€“ 6
The force said the figures are for crime reports with either the â€œReligion â€“ Jewishâ€ or â€œReligion â€“ Muslimâ€ prejudice marker attached. Markers are optional and added at the discretion of the inputting officer.
â€“ Lancashire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 4
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 3
The force said the figures had been compiled by searching for hate crimes marked as religious, followed by a manual review of each recorded crime to extract only those that were antisemitic and Islamophobic.
â€“ Leicestershire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 2
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 17, 2023 â€“ 6
â€“ Merseyside
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 20
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 9, 2022 â€“ 6, 2023 â€“ 10
The force said 18 of the 20 antisemitic offences in 2023 are conflict related and one of the 10 Islamophobic offences in 2023 is conflict related.
â€“ Norfolk
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 2
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 0
â€“ North Wales
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 3
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 3
â€“ North Yorkshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 3
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 2
The force said the numbers are for offences â€œreportedâ€ to the police.
â€“ Northamptonshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 1
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 1
The force said the figures show crimes with a racial or religious flag against them, where the search was for the words â€œJewishâ€ â€œHebrewâ€ â€œJudaisticâ€, â€œHasidicâ€, â€œIslamâ€ and â€œMuslimâ€. The search only returned exact matches and does not account for differences in terminology and/or spelling used. The force added that keyword searches are problematic and in no way provide accurate results or figures.
â€“ Northumbria
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 10, 2022 â€“ 3, 2023 â€“ 9
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 7, 2023 â€“ 5
The force said the figures were for offences flagged as â€œJudaismâ€ and â€œIslamâ€ and that hate crimes are based on the perception of the victim.
â€“ Nottinghamshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ under 5, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 7
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ under 5, 2022 â€“ under 5, 2023 â€“ 19
The force said all crimes have a religious and/or belief marker.
â€“ South Wales
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 8
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 7, 2022 â€“ 6, 2023 â€“ 9
The force said the figures are for occurrences with the qualifier of â€œHate/prejudice â€“ anti-Jewishâ€ and â€œHate/prejudice anti-Muslimâ€.
â€“ Suffolk
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 1
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 0
â€“ Surrey
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 7
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 8, 2023 â€“ 10
The force noted that offences are flagged as hate crimes at the discretion of the police officer or staff member.
â€“ Thames Valley
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 4, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 21
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 12, 2022 â€“ 14, 2023 â€“ 20
â€“ Warwickshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 1, 2022 â€“ 2, 2023 â€“ 3
Islamophobic: No information held
The force said the figures were obtained by searching for all crimes with a marker of â€œHate Motivated â€“ Religion â€“ Jewishâ€ and â€œHate Motivated â€“ Religion â€“ Muslimâ€ during the stated periods.
â€“ West Mercia
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 3
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 3, 2022 â€“ 4, 2023 â€“ 4
â€“ West Midlands
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 8, 2022 â€“ 1, 2023 â€“ 22
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 23, 2022 â€“ 33, 2023 â€“ 25
The force said the figures were obtained by searching for the hate strands â€œReligion â€“ Judaismâ€ and â€œReligion â€“ Islamâ€.
â€“ West Yorkshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 14, 2022 â€“ 10, 2023 â€“ 53
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 38, 2022 â€“ 29, 2023 â€“ 49
The force said the figures represent the number of faith hate crimes recorded where Islam or Judaism was identified as the religion targeted. The force added: â€œWe continue to work to better improve the investigation of hate crime and the outcomes for victims. The force has specialist hate crime co-ordinators who assist investigating officers in identifying perpetrators, providing after-care support for victims and working with communities to increase awareness of hate crime and reporting mechanisms. They also engage in joint working with partners such as local authorities, Victim Support and third-party Hate Incident Reporting Centres.â€
â€“ Wiltshire
Antisemitic: 2021 â€“ 0, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 3
Islamophobic: 2021 â€“ 2, 2022 â€“ 0, 2023 â€“ 5
Some 15 forces are not included in this list. Three forces said the precise data requested was not available; three forces said collection of the precise data requested would exceed the threshold for a Freedom of Information response to be supplied free of charge; four forces said there was a delay in supplying the data; and five forces had failed to respond to the request as of December 28 2023.

author: VideoElephant
title: Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024
text: At the start of the new year, 22 states and 43 cities and counties are increasing the hourly minimum wage, benefiting nearly 10 million people. And that doesn't only affect workers at major fast food chains or retail outlets; it also includes people who work at small, locally-owned businesses. spotlight Millions of U.S. workers will see a pay increase in 2024 - VideoElephant - - [0](https://dailyprogress.com/news/nation-world/government-politics/millions-of-u-s-workers-will-see-a-pay-increase-in-2024/article_5b9bc11d-4038-597f-88e7-c2ecc9de80f7.html?mode=comments) Related to this story Most Popular Maine has removed former President Donald Trump from the stateâ€™s presidential primary ballot under the Constitutionâ€™s insurrection clause in aâ€¦ As voters display a lack of enthusiasm for a Biden-Trump presidential rematch in 2024, could Robert F. Kennedy Jr. pull more votes from Joe Biâ€¦ Michigan's Supreme Court is keeping former President Donald Trump on the state's primary election ballot. Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley was asked by a New Hampshire voter about the reason for the Civil War, and she didn't mention slâ€¦ Republican U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene has been targeted with another swatting attempt at her Georgia residence.
